heisigStory: As in the character for sparkle, the triplication of a single element in this character indicates "everywhere" or "heaps of." When we think of goods in modern industrial society, we think of what has been mass-produced - that is to say, produced for the "masses" of open mouths waiting like fledglings in a nest to "consume" whatever comes their way.
koohiiStory1: Three boxes of goods are devoured by the hungry mouths of waiting consumers.
koohiiStory2: Three hungry mouths waiting for the goods to come.
